full_summary:
### Consulting Services in Sampling of Water and Ambiant Air
#### Solicitation Number: BA202285
#### Publication Date: March 30, 2023
#### Closing Date and Time: May 9, 2023, at 2:00:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time)

The Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking proposals for a Standing Offer (SO) to provide consulting services in sampling of water, ambient air, and under-slab fumes at Canadian Forces Base Bagotville (Quebec) and satellite sites in Quebec.

The consulting services will include professional support for sampling and analysis of water and ambient air, as well as under-slab fumes at the specified locations. The services will be provided on an "as and when required" basis to support Department of National Defence (DND) requirements.

The standing offer is to be established for a period of two (2) years with a maximum estimated value of $450,000.00. Call-ups under the standing offer are expected to be valued between $15,000.00 and $50,000.00, with a maximum value of $100,000.00.

Firms interested in providing these consulting services are invited to submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System. Bid documents and instructions for submission are available on the MERX website.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The evaluation of proposals will be based on the established criteria in the Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) document.

**Security Requirements:**
The security requirements for this project are identified in the RFAP document.

**Classification:**
The procurement category is Services (SRV).

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:
Francis Bélanger
Email: [francis.belanger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:francis.belanger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
Phone: 418-559-2804
